description:
Introduction to the game:

It took only two years for Kevin, the hero, to conquer the whole continent and establish a new Kalsas empire after he won the sword and the magic sword in the war.



However, 15 years after the reign of the hero king, the Empire was free from major wars and the devil tribe was blocked outside the eastern border.

However, the reappearance of the red evil stars in the sky makes the people with strength and ambition start to move foolishly.

Emperor Kevin suddenly declared to the world that a knight's Congress would be held in the Emperor's Capital. The prize was the prize that all knights in the world dreamed of, the Holy Sword! ________

Ultimately, where will your power lead you?



Skillful use of tactics and restraint system, led the Empire's Light Dragon Knights and girls to fight on the mainland, break through all the enemies in front of you!
